extension.summary: A simple all-around Maintenance Tool
extension.description: PSMC's Maintenance does many maintenance functions needed to help with a much smoother PSMC (Kodi) experience without all the fluff. Features include: Auto delete of cache at start up, notifies when packages and thumbs reach a set amount of wasted storage space (you can set and change sizes), cuts down on your devices read/writes on the ROM. Also has Backup/Restore Options, Speed test, and other features!!

Use at your own risk! The code for this addon was patched together by The Papaw.

extension.summary: Metadata and artwork from common sources like TMDB, IMDB, TADB, OMDB and fanart.tv
Metadatos e ilustraciones de fuentes comunes como TMDB, IMDB, TADB, OMDB y fanart.tv
extension.description: The metadata and artwork module for Kodi provides rich metadata, including artwork for various metatypes by scraping (and caching) this information from sites like TMDB, musicbrainz and fanart.tv. This product uses the TMDb API but is not endorsed or certified by TMDb.

El mÃ³dulo de metadatos e ilustraciones para Kodi proporciona metadatos enriquecidos, que incluyen ilustraciones paravarios metatipos al raspar (y almacenar en cachÃ©) esta informaciÃ³n se extrae de sitios como TMDB, musicbrainz and fanart.tv.[CR][CR]Este producto utiliza la API de TMDb pero no estÃ¡ avalado ni certificado por TMDb
extension.news:
v1.0.50 - remove rt - add tunefind - add metacritic for movie v1.0.49 - add landcapes - prepare metacritic for movie v1.0.48 - Add rt ratings reviews and info - Add metacritic ratting for tvshow - fix wrong local variable 'adb_album' v1.0.47 - Add Trakt for PVR v1.0.46 - Add Trakt v1.0.45 - Add button in settings "Delete simplecache.db" - Fix for movieset posters v1.0.43, v1.0.44 - Fixed SUPPORTS_POOL for Android v1.0.42 - Fixed stripchars PVR Title - Fixed ExtraPosters - Fix for "Resume" in dialog v1.0.41 - Fixed ExtraPosters - Fix for "Resume" in dialog v1.0.40 - Fix for missing TADB key v1.0.39 - Remove unicode - Fix for break site Kyradb - Add support for TADB encoding Ascii key - Add new info for TMDB (number_of_seasons, number_of_episodes and Seasons) v1.0.38 - fix for error 'sys' is not defined for extrafanart - fix for google - fix for colecting imdb.250 (movie and tv) - add new rotentomatoes info from omdb v1.0.37 - Smal fix for theaudiodb scraper v1.0.36 - Fix for theaudiodb scraper,Add some new Art thumb and label
v1.0.35 (wuff) - Remove BeautifulSoup3 dependency and use BeautifulSoup4 on Kodi 18 and 19 instead
v1.0.34 (wuff) - Set BeautifulSoup3 and MusicBrainz dependency as optional to allow install on Matrix
v1.0.33 (wuff) - replace xbmc.LOGNOTICE with xbmc.LOGINFO as LOGNOTICE was removed
v1.0.32 (wuff) - Remove python requirement for Kodi 18/19 compat - Change imdb Top250 parsing from lxml to html.parser - replace xbmc.translatePath with xmbcvfs.translatePath v1.0.31 (berkhornet) - Further fixes for PVR artwork v1.0.30 (berkhornet) - Kodi 19/Python 3 - Fixes for PVR artwork - Fix display of artwork when manually selecting from TVDB - Fixes for animated art and google v1.0.29 (wuff) - Remove python requirement for Kodi 18/19 compat v1.0.28 (wuff) - Kodi 19/Python 3 fixes v1.0.27 (finkleandeinhorn) - update omdb api key v1.0.26 (finkleandeinhorn, cartmandos) - enable caching of omdb/tmdb data - remove duplicate "Title" parameter v1.0.25 (marcelveldt) - Last version 30 Mar 2018

extension.summary: Python bindings for Musicbrainz' NGS webservice

extension.summary: Resolve common video host URL's to be playable in XBMC/Kodi.
Resolver enlaces a videos de sitios populares para poder reproducirlos en XBMC/Kodi.
Prilagodi najčešće URL-ove video izvora kako bi radili u XBMC/Kodiju.
Επίλυση συνδέσμων κοινών εξυπηρετητών σε μορφή βίντεο ικανό για αναπαραγωγή στο XBMC/Kodi.
extension.description: Resolve common video host URL's to be playable in XBMC/Kodi, simplify addon development of video plugins requiring multi video hosts.
Επίλυση συνδέσμων κοινών εξυπηρετητών σε μορφή βίντεο ικανό για αναπαραγωγή στο XBMC/Kodi, απλοποίηση της ανάπτυξης των προσθέτων που χρησιμοποιούν πολλαπλούς εξυπηρετητές για υλικό βίντεο
Prilagodi najčešće URL-ove video izvora kako bi radili u XBMC/Kodiju, pojednostavnjuje razvoj priključaka za video dodatke koji zahtjevaju višestruke video izvore.
extension.disclaimer: This script only resolves video content from legitimate file lockers without prejudice. If this script is being used by 3rd parties to resolve content that you feel infringes upon your Intellectual Property then please take your complaints to the actual website or developer linking to such content and not here. This script in no way searches for any content whatsoever.

Το ανωτέρο σενάριο το μόνο που κάνει είναι να επιλύει οπτικοακουστικό περιεχόμενο από νόμιμες πηγές χωρίς προκατάληψη. Εάν το ανωτέρο σενάριο χρησιμοποιηθεί από τρίτους ώστε να επιλύσει περιεχόμενο το οποίο σας προκαλεί αντίδραση ότι παραβιάζει την πνευματική σας ιδιοκτησία παρακαλώ μεταφέρετε τα παραπονά σας στον ιστότοπο τον οποίο βρίσκεται το εν λόγω περιεχόμενο η τον δημιουργό ο οποίος πραγματοποιεί την σύνδεση και όχι εδω. Το σενάριο αυτό ουδεμία περίπτωση πραγματοποιεί αναζήτηση περιεχομένου.

extension.summary: Streamlink Library for Kodi

extension.summary: Test your Internet bandwidth
extension.description:
This add-on tests your Internet bandwith and reports both download and upload speeds and latency from within Kodi.
Use this if you are experiencing streaming issues and you suspect your network to be the cause.
extension.disclaimer: Speed Tester is powered by speedtest.net

v1.1.1 (2020-10-10) - Add localization
v1.1.0 (2020-09-26) - Move add-on to Add-ons project - Fix typos and structure of standard output
v1.0.1 (2019-08-06) - Initial release

extension.description: Сваля информация за предстоящите ТВ сериали. Вече никога няма да пропускате епизод от ТВ сериали, които следите.
Agafar informació de les sèries de TV que es retransmetran pròximament. No te'n perdràs cap mai més.

TV Show Next Aired liefert Termin-Informationen über die anstehenden Episoden der Serien aus der Datenbank. Dazu gibt es eine Wochenansicht mit allen in der nächsten Woche laufenden Episoden sowie (bei vorhandenem Skin Support) die direkte Integration der Informationen in die Ansichten des jeweiligen Skins. Sie werden nie wieder eine Folge verpassen.
Λήψη πληροφοριών για την Επόμενη Προβολή των Τηλ. Σειρών. Δε θα ξαναχάσετε επεισόδιο ποτέ.
Get info for TV Shows Next Aired. You'll never miss one again.
Get info for TV Shows Next Aired. You'll never miss one again.
Get info for TV Shows Next Aired. You'll never miss one again.
Obtener información de las siguientes emisiones de series. Nunca te perderás una de nuevo.
Obtener información de las siguientes emisiones de series. Nunca te perderás una de nuevo.
Ce script interroge votre médiathèque puis vas récupérer les infos sur les prochaines diffusions de vos séries. vous n'en manquerez plus aucune.
Obtenir les infos de prochaine diffusion des séries télé. Vous n'en manquerez plus jamais une.

extension.summary: [COLOR FFFFFF00]COMPLETELEY[/COLOR] redesigned. Skin updated and modded. Added home screen animation [I][COLOR FFE67300]{can be disabled in settings}[/COLOR][/I], new features and views.
extension.description: [COLOR FFFFFF00]COMPLETELEY[/COLOR] redesigned. Skin updated and modded. Added home screen animation [COLOR FFE67300] which can be disabled in settings[/COLOR], new features and views. Created for use with PSMC [I]{a Kodi fork}[/I]. Please give credit to Mike, The Papaw and all others that have contributed.[I][COLOR FFE67300] You will need to enable the Batman GUI SOUNDS in the System Settings if you wish to use them.[/COLOR][/I] [I](themed from AeonNoxSilvo)[/I]
extension.news: [B][I][COLOR FFFFFF00]Skin updated, modded and Completely Redesigned[/COLOR][/I][/B][CR][COLOR FF00D5FF]- Added NEW Home Screen Animation[/COLOR][CR][COLOR FF00D5FF]- Additional Falling Seasons[/COLOR][CR][COLOR FFE67300]Included with v7.9.4 Silvo update by Mike[/COLOR][CR]- Fix Live TV OSD button focus when unable to pause[CR]- Fixes to DialogSelect[CR]- Fix no items in Ask Default Background selection on new installs[CR]- Drop Skin Helper Widgets for favorites and use favourites:// path instead[CR]- Update and add some missing icons[CR]- Fix Netherlands rating classification images[CR]- Update and re-design PVR Group Manager[CR]- Fix Menu resetting to defaults[CR]- Add TMDb search from DialogVideoInfo Extras on Home screen[CR]- Fix missing icon/poster in SlimList[CR]- PVR updates and additions[CR]- Updated language files from Transifex[CR]- Revert removal of bottom OSD button position[CR]- Add option to use Skin Info Service for Movie Set Plots in Video Info[CR]- Fix default letter jump appearing on side menu settings button focus[CR]- Add "fixed" option for video RightList[CR]- Tweak Vertical Menu fixed behaviour to match Horizontal[CR]- Rework Live TV guide with icons from Estuary and re-add channel logos[CR]- Add disable to submenu items in Main Menu Customizer[CR]- Add information setting to SlimList[CR]- Remove script.extendedinfo and add script.embuary.info support[CR]- Add DialogVideoInfo for sets[CR]- Add some v19 skin engine changes[CR]- Use script.embuary.helper for Similiar and Directer movies in DialogVideoInfo[CR]- Add missing PVR label to Widget info[CR]- Add Glow Bars and System Glow Bars to color customizer[CR]- Add Jump to Letter bar to Video library using script.embuary.helper[CR]- Fix playlist backgrounds for Main Menu not following user set rotation speed[CR]- Redesign DialogExtendedProgressBar and DialogVolumeBar[CR]- Make OSD buttons on top default and remove option[CR]- Redesign PlayerProcessInfo[CR]- Clean up Main Menu and Widget Customizers[CR]- Fill empty space with more info in some views[CR][CR][B]All updates may contain various changes and/or improvements[/B][CR][I][COLOR FFFF0202]Please give credit to all the devolopers (Especially Mike) that has shared most of these changes. Also all others that have and do contribute to this skin![/COLOR][/I]

extension.summary: [COLOR FFFFFF00]COMPLETELEY[/COLOR] redesigned. Skin updated and modded. Added home screen animation [I][COLOR FFE67300]{can be disabled in settings}[/COLOR][/I], new features and views.
extension.description: [COLOR FFFFFF00]COMPLETELEY[/COLOR] redesigned. Skin updated and modded. Added home screen animation [COLOR FFE67300] which can be disabled in settings[/COLOR], new features and views. Created for use with PSMC [I]{a Kodi fork}[/I]. Please give credit to Mike, The Papaw and all others that have contributed.[I][COLOR FFE67300] You will need to enable the Man Of Steel GUI SOUNDS in the System Settings if you wish to use them.[/COLOR][/I] [I](themed from AeonNoxSilvo)[/I]
extension.news: [B][I][COLOR FFFFFF00]Skin updated, modded and Completely Redesigned[/COLOR][/I][/B][CR][COLOR FF00D5FF]- Added NEW Home Screen Animation[/COLOR][CR][COLOR FF00D5FF]- Additional Falling Seasons[/COLOR][CR][COLOR FFE67300]Included with v7.9.4 Silvo update by Mike[/COLOR][CR]- Fix Live TV OSD button focus when unable to pause[CR]- Fixes to DialogSelect[CR]- Fix no items in Ask Default Background selection on new installs[CR]- Drop Skin Helper Widgets for favorites and use favourites:// path instead[CR]- Update and add some missing icons[CR]- Fix Netherlands rating classification images[CR]- Update and re-design PVR Group Manager[CR]- Fix Menu resetting to defaults[CR]- Add TMDb search from DialogVideoInfo Extras on Home screen[CR]- Fix missing icon/poster in SlimList[CR]- PVR updates and additions[CR]- Updated language files from Transifex[CR]- Revert removal of bottom OSD button position[CR]- Add option to use Skin Info Service for Movie Set Plots in Video Info[CR]- Fix default letter jump appearing on side menu settings button focus[CR]- Add "fixed" option for video RightList[CR]- Tweak Vertical Menu fixed behaviour to match Horizontal[CR]- Rework Live TV guide with icons from Estuary and re-add channel logos[CR]- Add disable to submenu items in Main Menu Customizer[CR]- Add information setting to SlimList[CR]- Remove script.extendedinfo and add script.embuary.info support[CR]- Add DialogVideoInfo for sets[CR]- Add some v19 skin engine changes[CR]- Use script.embuary.helper for Similiar and Directer movies in DialogVideoInfo[CR]- Add missing PVR label to Widget info[CR]- Add Glow Bars and System Glow Bars to color customizer[CR]- Add Jump to Letter bar to Video library using script.embuary.helper[CR]- Fix playlist backgrounds for Main Menu not following user set rotation speed[CR]- Redesign DialogExtendedProgressBar and DialogVolumeBar[CR]- Make OSD buttons on top default and remove option[CR]- Redesign PlayerProcessInfo[CR]- Clean up Main Menu and Widget Customizers[CR]- Fill empty space with more info in some views[CR][CR][B]All updates may contain various changes and/or improvements[/B][CR][I][COLOR FFFF0202]Please give credit to all the devolopers (Especially Mike) that has shared most of these changes. Also all others that have and do contribute to this skin![/COLOR][/I]

extension.summary: PSMC Max... A new skin designed for PSMC-19 or Kodi.
extension.description: Designed for PSMC or Kodi. Many design layouts to choose from including the PSMC Max layout! This skin was forked from the Bingie Mod. Please give credit to all those involved in making that mod!
extension.news: [B]PSMC Max[/B][CR]Designed to use with PSMC-19 (or Kodi). For updates visit:[CR]https://github.com/ThePapaw/psmc
